title: Vlogging
description: If a picture is worth a thousand words, then a video is worth millions. I love capturing memorable moments or progression in one's journey. Even though it can be awkward for some of my friends in the moment, they always appreciate being able to revisit these time-capsuled moments.

title: Calisthenics
description: Growing up I could not do a single pull-up. Since I started my calisthenics journey, I achieved my first after 2.5 months! I've always admired the mastery of bodyweight movements more than lifting heavy. I will participate in the Murph Challenge on Memorial Day '25, stay tuned!

title: Cooking
description: I love to eat—who doesn't? I enjoy learning new recipes, cooking for others, and experimenting with wacky ideas. It's so satisfying when my guests want a second plate. I am currently working on a cookbook of all my favorite foods!

title: Karaoke
description: "If you can talk, you can sing"—that's what convinced me to give karaoke a try. Through karaoke, I've made friends from all different cultures and backgrounds. It encourages me to explore new songs across all genres, widening my perspective.
